item.title: Sony's high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video
item.description: Sony’s high-resolution A7R V mirrorless camera now shoots 8K video Sony has launched the $3,900 A7R V, its latest mirrorless camera designed to shoot portraits, landscapes and other subjects that require as much resolution as possible.

item.title: OM System unveils the OM-5, its first camera without the Olympus name
item.description: OM System unveils the OM-5, its first camera without the Olympus name OM System has launched its first camera that doesn't carry the Olympus name, the $1,200 OM-5 â€” and it looks a lot like the Olympus OM-D E-M5 Mark III, other than a few tweaks.
